title: Vision
description: When I say the word 'beauty', what do you envision? ⁠This magnificent abstract painting feels new everytime you look at it.⁠ With loads of different colors, long brushstrokes and subtle details, this painting never gets boring!⁠

title: Flower
description: Designed to resonate & spark a mix of feelings. Every day. Whether you love art or just looking to decorate, this handmade painting will instantly create a new ambience in your home or office.

title: Ruby
description: What a gemstone of a painting this is! Beautifully contrasting baby blue with ravishing ruby and coal-black with pearl white to create a well-balanced eye-catcher, perfectly suited for any home interior!

title: Red Thread
description: Designed to resonate & spark a mix of feelings. Every day. Whether you love art or just looking to decorate, this handmade painting will instantly create a new ambience in your home or office.

title: Spring
description: Get a fresh taste of spring in your home with this beautiful handmade painting! Its thick-layered, bright colors make it almost feel as if you can pick and smell the flowers!

title: Distance
description: Designed to resonate & spark a mix of feelings. Every day. Whether you love art or just looking to decorate, this handmade painting will instantly create a new ambience in your home or office.

title: Cyclone
description: This painting takes you by storm! With a cyclone of paint whirled around in controlled chaos, this painting draws you in, over and over! Many vibrant colors are flowing around, almost like a perfect storm!

title: Kiss of Spring
description: Designed to resonate & spark a mix of feelings. Every day. Whether you love art or just looking to decorate, this handmade painting will instantly create a new ambience in your home or office.

title: Rain

title: Patches of Snow
description: Beautiful white patches of snow, together forming a white-colored blanket of paint. This unique modern art piece portrays the magical enchantment of snow with the use of a special technique, where the paint really pops out of its canvas!⁠

title: Conversations
description: Designed to resonate & spark a mix of feelings. Every day. Whether you love art or just looking to decorate, this handmade painting will instantly create a new ambience in your home or office.

title: Seashore
description: Due to its abstract nature and foggy style of painting, this painting captures the melancholic, cold winds by the seashore perfectly. ⁠With all its mystery and mystique, this painting will astonish you, again and again.

title: Galaxy
description: Explore the vast and incredibly beautiful galaxy with this magnificent handmade painting! The dark blue colours contrast beautifully with the pearl white patches and the bright golden flakes, making it a sophisticated addition to any home interior.

title: Clouds
description: Look at the abstract shapes of this painting and let your thoughts run free! The soothing colors have a relaxing and appealing effect. Perfectly suited to decorate your walls and brighten up your home interior!

title: Magnolia Garden
description: A pair of magnolias always puts a smile on our faces! An amazing array of joyful, white flowers shines together like one rich, white-colored garden.⁠ Cheer up your home with this lovely painting!
